name: Enchanted Arms
storyline: "Become the saviot in a war 1,000 years in the making. As Atsuma, transform from naive student to powerful warrior. Immerse yourself in a deep storyline and explore fantastical environments, as you master fighting skills and magical abilities."
summary: An action adventure role-playing game that has a linear storyline with a somewhat open world to travel through and explore. Along with 4 main playable characters mix your team up with over 100 collectable creatures scattered throughout the game. Uses a turn based battle system with each side on its own 3 by 4 square grid area across from each other. Characters can move a set number of squares on the grid each turn and skills have different area of effect patterns.
